Message: Correction for misleading error message when using BWCube class with packaging while an empty resultset is returned from SAP
Updated logic in code generation for SAP queries (MaxRows setting) of the LINQ designers.
Performance tweak for character-like values in tables/structures
New version for testing purpose. Please ignore!
Fixed ERPConnect references after changes to support Final Builder.
Fix for memory leaks in R3Connection.ConfirmTID() and RFCFunction.Execute(tid)
Changed DataTableMetadata constructor to use IList instead of IColllection
Correction for misformated PERIO field like in CE1* tables when using compression
Added support for alternative BAPI for reading tables
